ComicInfo.Title: Bosom Buddies, Part 3 of 4: Crack the Internet in Half
ComicInfo.Summary: The Black Box has access to all of the world’s telecommunications, and knowledge is power! But you know what else is power? Big smacking guns that never seem to draw blood but make all kinds of crackly energy come out of them! Now THAT’s power! And you know who has LOTS of those guns...? Cable, of course! (Where were you in the ‘90s?) Part 3 (of 4).
ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with the ninjas.walk.alone fork of ComicTagger 1.3.5 using info from Comic Vine on 2024-08-04 15:13:19. [CVDB106409]
ComicInfo.CoverArtist: Crystal Reid, Patrick Zircher, Rob Schwager
ComicInfo.Editor: Joe Quesada, John Barber, Nicole Wiley Boose, Ralph Macchio
ComicInfo.Characters: Asp, Black Box, Black Mamba, Cable, Cat, Deadpool, Diamondback, Dominus, Irene Merryweather, Makeshift, Rive
